data.text: She even partied with Helen Hunt as a little girl at her friends birthday party.
My sister loved the movie twister so much she is basically married to an engineer and lives in Houston with the tornados.  His personality is just like the male lead.

As a big brother its mostly like being a human jungle gym.  Kids climb you like one and grab your leg so you can't walk and swing from it.  That is mostly what they do.  They cry and get scared by Jurassic Park...and love the movie Twister.
